name: The Summon
description:
This is an RPG where you can decide what kind of build you are going to make. Become a tank that focuses on damage mitigation, healing and reflecting damage back to your opponents or a glass cannon that focuses on high burst damage with massive lifesteal or a summoner focused on buffing up their summon and ranged damage.

Key Features


  • Progress through the game with your friends.
  • Select a class and level up your character.
  • Loot enchanted weapons and upgrade your armor.
  • Farming!
  • Clear dungeons for loot.
  • Enchant your armor for specific builds with a lot of freedom (lifesteal, reflect, hp regen...)
  • Micromanage the look on your character with 13 different armorpieces (left lower bracer, left upper bracer, left glove..)

    You can only play this with people on your Steam friends list. Invite or join them through the Steam overlay.

    This game is 100% free.
